name: Subsurface
description:
Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Click to "interact" with yellow objects and humans
  • space to jump
  • Your rage bar at the top will fill up with each kill

Subsurface is an action game, where you play as a monster uncovered by a questionable organisation. Will you manage your rage? Or will you fling out of control.

Warnings:

  • Gore (Not really, but if you're squeamish about blood)
  • Horrible tentacle monsters (I don't think it will set off your arachnophobia)

Credits:

Music by kno.m (Freddie Harrison)
